definition: to research/to check/to investigate/to examine/to refer to/to look up (e.g. a word in a dictionary)

sentences.english: The result will be published in time once all data are processed.
sentences.chinese: 一俟數據處理完畢，這次普查的結果將及時公佈。

sentences.english: The census in the world's second-most populous country is held every 10 years.
sentences.chinese: 印度每十年舉行一次人口普查。

sentences.english: Departures from seasonal jobs, such as Census taker, are not counted.
sentences.chinese: 季節性工作人員的離職，如普查人員，沒有加入統計。

sentences.english: No Brian, I think you mean for the census.
sentences.chinese: 我認爲你說的是人口普查。

sentences.english: Their model’s predictions match well with the early census data.
sentences.chinese: 這個模型預測的結果與早期的人口普查數據契合良好。

sentences.english: The assessment work seems to have discouraged this type of airborne survey.
sentences.chinese: 普查工作似乎會使這種類型的航測遭到挫折。

sentences.english: Department of Geology and Mineral Resources of North China Petroleum Geological Exploration Bureau census …
sentences.chinese: 地質礦產部華北石油地質局第三普查勘探大隊修配廠。

sentences.english: The facile answer is a multimethod approach.
sentences.chinese: 最方便的答案是多種方法的普查。

sentences.english: Ideas on search for minerals and exploitation of precious stone resources in Sichuan are put forward.
sentences.chinese: 就四川寶玉石普查找礦和開發利用提出了見解。

sentences.english: This paper presents counter-measures to the problems found in general investigation.
sentences.chinese: 本文就在普查中發現的問題闡述了相應的處理意見。

sentences.english: Last year's national census count estimated the population at six hundred twenty-one thousand.
sentences.chinese: 去年全國人口普查數估計在六十二萬一人口。

sentences.english: The census undercounted the agricultural population.
sentences.chinese: 人口普查少算了農業人口。

sentences.english: It must be pay much attention to this specific characteristics in the future uranium prospecting and exploration in that area.
sentences.chinese: 今後在該區進行鈾礦普查勘探工作應當注意這一特點。

sentences.english: He told us how census workers count people who are homeless.
sentences.chinese: 他向記者透露了普查員如何統計無家可歸者的人數。

sentences.english: Censuses arc prominent throughout the pages of Scripture.
sentences.chinese: 在整本聖經中，戶口普查是一件突出的事。

sentences.english: Past censuses have not reported data on gays who consider themselves married.
sentences.chinese: 上次人口普查並沒有報道同性婚姻的數據。

definition: to have a clear view (of a situation)/to fish for information/fact-finding
to inspect/to run through a checklist/to take stock/to audit
random inspection/to do a spot check
test point/to carry out trial/pilot scheme
Ministry of Land and Resources (MLR), formed in 1998
to launch/to develop/to unfold/(of an exhibition etc) to open
